com.ddtek.xquery.xqj
Interface ExtPlanExplain

public interface ExtPlanExplain

Enables the DataDirect XQuery plan explain feature.
The following example shows how to generate an XQuery execution plan using the plan explain feature. 

   ...
   XQExpression exp = conn.createExpression();
   ExtPlanExplain explain = (ExtPlanExplain)exp;
   XQResultSequence seq = explain.explain("for $item in fn:doc('items.xml')/items/item");
   seq.writeSequence(new FileOutputStream("queryplan.xhtml"), null);
   seq.close();
   exp.close();
   ...

Method Detail

explain

javax.xml.xquery.XQResultSequence explain(String query)
                                          throws javax.xml.xquery.XQException
Requests an execution plan for the specified query. The returned XQResultSequence contains the XML document representing the execution plan. It can be processed as any other result with the XQJ API.

Parameters:
query - The query for which the execution plan is requested.
Returns:
an XQResultSequence containing an XML document representing the execution plan.
Throws:
javax.xml.xquery.XQException - if the execution plan cannot be generated.

explain

javax.xml.xquery.XQResultSequence explain(Reader query)
                                          throws javax.xml.xquery.XQException
Requests an execution plan for the specified query. This method is equivalent to explain(String), but the query is specified as a java.io.Reader.

Parameters:
query - The query for which the execution plan is requested.
Returns:
an XQResultSequence containing an XML document representing the execution plan.
Throws:
javax.xml.xquery.XQException - if the execution plan cannot be generated.

explain

javax.xml.xquery.XQResultSequence explain(InputStream query)
                                          throws javax.xml.xquery.XQException
Requests an execution plan for the specified query. This method is equivalent to explain(String), but the query is specified as a java.io.InputStream.

Parameters:
query - The query for which the execution plan is requested.
Returns:
an XQResultSequence containing an XML document representing the execution plan.
Throws:
javax.xml.xquery.XQException - if the execution plan cannot be generated.

setResourceLocation

void setResourceLocation(String resourceLocation)
                         throws javax.xml.xquery.XQException
Sets the directory where the generated execution plan references its required resources such as images, JavaScript, and HTML stylesheets. The default directory is http://www.xquery.com/planExplain3.

Parameters:
resourceLocation - A directory accessed by a Web browser containing resource files used by the generated execution plan.
Throws:
javax.xml.xquery.XQException - if a null value is specified.

setPlanFormat

void setPlanFormat(String format)
                   throws javax.xml.xquery.XQException
Sets the execution plan format, either PLAN_EXPLAIN_AS_XML or PLAN_EXPLAIN_AS_XHTML. The default is PLAN_EXPLAIN_AS_XHTML.

Parameters:
format - The format in which the execution plan will be generated. Must be PLAN_EXPLAIN_AS_XML or PLAN_EXPLAIN_AS_XHTML.
Throws:
javax.xml.xquery.XQException - if a null value is specified.
